Module edu.citadel.cprl
Package edu.citadel.cprl.ast

Class AST

java.lang.Object
edu.citadel.cprl.ast.AST
Direct Known Subclasses:
Declaration, Expression, Program, Statement
public abstract class AST extends Object
Base class for all abstract syntax tree classes.

      public abstract void checkConstraints()
      Check semantic/contextual constraints.

    • emit

      public abstract void emit() throws CodeGenException
      Emit object code.
      Throws:
      CodeGenException - if the method is unable to generate object code.

    • getNewLabel

      protected String getNewLabel()
      Returns a new value for a label number. This method should be called once for each label before code generation.

    • matchTypes

      protected boolean matchTypes(Type type, Expression expr)
      Returns true if the expression type is assignment compatible with the specified type. This method is used to compare types for assignment statements, subprogram parameters, and return values.

    • emitLoadInst

      protected void emitLoadInst(Type t)
      Emits the appropriate LOAD instruction based on the type.

    • emitStoreInst

      protected void emitStoreInst(Type t)
      Emits the appropriate STORE instruction based on the type.

    • emitLabel

      protected void emitLabel(String label)
      Emit label for assembly instruction. This instruction appends a colon to the end of the label and writes out the result on a single line.

    • emit

      protected void emit(String instruction)
      Emit string representation for an assembly instruction.
